attributes.additional_details:
we are a group that have the simple intention of raising awareness on the consequences of size 0 modelling.

Of course, we realize banning 'size 0' models would be a big stretch but with our efforts and yours, we hope to at  least place a label to help our the more influenced and  vulnerable realize that a certain image has been photo-shopped and airbrushed in some way.

we hope you can come to terms to the importance of this petition.
